summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of TTS app Keywords Filter feature and all existing tabs functionality

design_issues.issue: CORS errors in console when trying to connect to Kick API
design_issues.description: Access to Kick API blocked by CORS policy, but this appears to be expected behavior for external API calls from browser

passed_tests: App loads successfully with all 6 tabs visible (Playback, Voices, Chat, Keywords, Timers, Connections)
Keywords tab is clickable and displays Keywords Filter panel
Enable Keywords Filter checkbox toggles status pill between Enabled/Disabled
Add Keyword functionality works with text input and Add Keyword button
Enter key press adds keywords correctly
Case-sensitive toggle checkbox works per keyword in add form
Individual case-sensitive toggle works for each keyword in the list
Keyword count updates properly when adding/deleting
Error handling for empty keywords shows proper message
Duplicate keyword prevention works with proper error message
No keywords message displays when list is empty
All existing tabs (Playback, Voices, Chat, Timers, Connections) work correctly
Tab navigation between all sections functions properly
